content: knit kippah round 12 knit round 13 k6 kfb 9 times 72 sts worked in the round round 14 knit make a magic_ring with us 2 3 mm dpn round 15 k7 kfb 9 times 81 sts or magic loop circular needles work k1 yo 2 times k1 into the magic_ring 5 sts round 16 knit set-up round 1 working these sts onto round 17 k8 kfb 9 times 90 sts three separate dpn or magic loop work round 18 knit kfb 4 times k1 9 of the round 72 sts round 1 make a magic_ring with c 3 round 14 single_crochet around mm crochet hook chain 1 work 8 single_crochet into the round 15 *increase 8 single_crochet repeat from * to the magic_ring end of the round 80 sts note place a locking marker on the first stitch round 16 single_crochet around of each round to keep track of the start move the marker with each new round round 17 *9 single_crochet increase repeat from * to the round 2 increase into each stitch 16 sts end of the round 88 sts round 3 *1 single_crochet increase repeat from * to the round 18 single_crochet around end of the round 24 sts round 19 *7 single_crochet increase repeat from * to the round 4 *increase 2 single_crochet repeat from * to the end of the round 99 sts end of the round 32 sts round 20 single_crochet around round 5 single_crochet around round 21 4 single_crochet *increase 8 single_crochet repeat from * to round 6 *3 single_crochet increase repeat from * to the the last 4 sts increase 4 single_crochet 110 sts end of the round 40 sts round 22 single_crochet around round 7 *increase 4 single_crochet repeat from * to the decreases are worked as follows insert hook end of the round 48 sts into stitch yarn over pull yarn over out of the stitch two loops are now on the hook insert round 8 single_crochet around hook into next
